LanguageData.VREA_AptitudeIncapable.label: incapable of {0}
LanguageData.VREA_AptitudeIncapable.description: Androids with this subroutine are incapable of doing any tasks related to {0} skill.
LanguageData.VREA_AptitudeBasic.label: basic {0}
LanguageData.VREA_AptitudeBasic.description: Android's aptitude in {0} is increased by 4. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level.
LanguageData.VREA_AptitudeIntermediate.label: intermediate {0}
LanguageData.VREA_AptitudeIntermediate.description: Android's aptitude in {0} is increased by 8. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level.
LanguageData.VREA_AptitudeAdvanced.label: advanced {0}
LanguageData.VREA_AptitudeAdvanced.description: Android's aptitude in {0} is increased by 12. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level.
LanguageData.VREA_AptitudeExpert.label: expert {0}
LanguageData.VREA_AptitudeExpert.description: Android's aptitude in {0} is increased by 16. Aptitude acts like an offset on skill level.
